name: WILDER 4 fire
description:
You're near death when you find yourself turning to some suspicious and dangerous creatures to save you.

They offer a game of cards, three rounds, to see if you are worthy of saving yourself.

**Game is meant to be a short 10-15 minute game. The first round of cards is playable, I'm fixing up the second two along with some updated artwork!

Please let me know any bugs you find.

Awesome music by MD Wade - https://mdwade.com, check them out!
